name: CVE-2017-2938
description: Adobe Flash Player versions 24.0.0.186 and earlier have a security bypass vulnerability related to handling TCP connections.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:*:*:*:*:*:chrome:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:mac_os_x:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:google:chrome_os:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:linux:linux_kernel:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:*:*:*:*:*:internet_explorer:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:*:*:*:*:*:edge:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:flash_player:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:mac_os_x:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:linux:linux_kernel:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
